experiences.subtitle: Web Development
workDescription: Built responsive web applications using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Applied clean code principles and version control using Git & GitHub.
Graduated with GPA 4.29 (With Honors) from Taibah University in Web Development.

experiences.subtitle: Event & Team Management
workDescription: Led planning and execution of university events and student-led initiatives.
Organized volunteer drives and managed logistics for outreach programs.
Coordinated guest invitations and handled VIP reception at formal events.
Planned meetings and communication with cross-functional teams.

experiences.subtitle: Health & Fitness Training
workDescription: Provided one-on-one personal training and group fitness classes.
Specialized in strength, flexibility, and mobility coaching.
Developed workout plans tailored to individual goals.
Motivated clients to adopt sustainable healthy habits.

experiences.subtitle: Patient Support & Community Involvement
workDescription: Completed 204 hours of volunteer work with patient care and administrative tasks.
Supported medical staff and coordinated with patients and families.
Assisted in organizing community health awareness events.
Enhanced soft skills in empathy, communication, and responsibility.
